upload failed. Permission denied. Permissions We take privacy very seriously. We use these permissions strictly for the stated purpose.
we take privacy very seriously. We use thes permissions strickly for the stated pupose. \n\n To easily make transfers to your contacts and see your transactions history Kola Wallet needs the following permissions: You need to go to your settings to enable the missing permissions. Settings Continue Reset Accessibility Allows the app to run USSDs payment steps automatically 1- Go to or Search Accessibility in your parameters 2- Find Kola Wallet 3- Switch on or activate accessibility permission for Kola Wallet 4- Return to Kola Wallet Turn on Accessibility in the next screen to run USSD sessions Step 1 Select Kola Wallet Step 2 Activate the switch by turning it on Proceed Activate the Overlay Permission in the next screen You will not be able to see your transactions history We don\'t read your SMS! this is needed to show your transactions history in the App. You will not be able to access your contacts in the App. "Used to show contacts when you want to perform a transaction. " You will not be able to transfer money to your contacts Allow the App to manage USSD sessions "You will not be able to take pictures, and scan any QRcode " "Used to take pictures directly from your device's camera. " Use to upload pictures from gallery you will not be able to upload pictures from gallery Read SMS Read Contacts Phone Call Overlay Camera Storage tap to open camera to scan QR code Microphone You will not be able to send voice messages to the support chat Use to send voice messages in the support chat send by www.kolawallet.app/ Loading… This option is not available for single account Select a contact Airtime paid to Send me the code again Request the code again in "Enter the 6-digit code sent to " " Please choose a phone number" Waiting for sms verification do not close the application.
